description:
After fetching provider configurations from /api/v1/llm-providers and /api/v1/embedding-providers, cache results in localStorage with a TTL (e.g., 5 minutes). On subsequent page loads, render immediately from cache and revalidate in background, updating only if changed.

**Rationale:** Provider configs are fetched on every settings page load and agent initialization but change infrequently. Caching eliminates 2-4 API roundtrips (100-300ms total) on each page transition, making agent startup feel instant. Background revalidation ensures users see updates within minutes.
title: Cache LLM Provider and Embedding Provider Configs in LocalStorage
